metadata.name: Digital Heritage Foundation
metadata.description:
The goal of the foundation is to enable people to participate in supporting and preserving the ideas and artistic expressions most important for our civilization, through the ownership of digital NFTs that represent the greatest intellectual and artistic achievements of past generations.

By taking ownership of NFTs that represent what you consider the most important parts of human culture, you support those parts of culture and vote for them to live on as parts of our digital heritage.
